sen.j: 吉良 尊義（きら たかよし、貞和4年/正平 (日本)3年（1348年） - 没年不詳）は南北朝時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: Takayoshi KIRA (1348-the year of death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).

sen.e: Takayoshi KIRA (1348 - the year of death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).

sen.j: 吉良満義の子（系図により三男とも四男とも言われる）。
sen.e: Mitsuyoshi KIRA's son (believed to be the Third or the Fourth son according to the family tree).
He was Mitsuyoshi KIRA's son (believed to be the third or the fourth son according to the family tree).
sen.cmt: 念のため、主語を入れました。また、Third とFourth の大文字を小文字に訂正しました。
sen.e: He was Mitsuyoshi KIRA's son (believed to be the third or the fourth son according to the family tree).
He was Mitsusada KIRA's younger brother.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れ： 完全に訳が抜けていました。
sen.e: He was Mitsusada KIRA's younger brother.

sen.j: 後期東条吉良氏（下吉良）の初代。
sen.e: He was the first generation of the end period of the Tojokira clan (Shitakira, Shimokira).
He was the first generation of the end period of the Tojokira clan (Shitakira, Shimokira).
He was the first generation of the end period of the Tojokira clan (Shitakira, Shimokira).

sen.j: のち足利尊氏より一字をもらい尊義と名乗る。
sen.e: Later he was given one character from Takauji ASHIKAGA and changed his name to Takayoshi.
Later he was given one Chinese character in Takauji ASHIKAGA's name and changed his name to Takayoshi.
sen.cmt: 尊氏の名前の漢字から1文字もらったことがわかりにくいため、訂正しました。
sen.e: Later he was given one Chinese character in Takauji ASHIKAGA's name and changed his name to Takayoshi.

sen.j: 前期東条吉良氏（奥州・武蔵吉良氏）の吉良貞家・吉良満家父子が奥州に去った後、東条の地は惣領家である西条吉良氏のものとなり、吉良満義が東条城を接収した。
sen.e: After Sadaie KIRA and Mitsuie KIRA; father and son in the early period of the Tojokira clan left for Oshu (Northern Honshu), Tojo's territory became the territory of the Saijokira clan which was a Soryo (government) family and Mitsuyoshi KIRA seized the Tojo-jo Castle.

After Sadaie KIRA and Mitsuie KIRA; father and son in the early period of the Tojokira clan left for Oshu (Northern Honshu), Tojo's territory became the territory of the Saijokira clan which was a Soryo (government) family and Mitsuyoshi KIRA seized the Tojo-jo Castle.

After Sadaie KIRA and Mitsuie KIRA; father and son in the early period of the Tojokira clan left for Oshu (Northern Honshu), Tojo's territory became the territory of the Saijokira clan which was a Soryo (government) family and Mitsuyoshi KIRA seized the Tojo-jo Castle.

sen.j: その後、尊義が生まれるが、間もなく観応の擾乱が始まった。
sen.e: Takayoshi was born after that and the Kano Disturbance erupted soon after and Mitsuyoshi and Mitsusada; father and son moved from place to place fight on the side of Tadayoshi ASHIKAGA and after Tadayoshi's death, they allied with his adopted son Tadafuyu and Nancho (Southern Court) and were at war with Takauji.
Takayoshi was born after that and the Kano Disturbance erupted soon after.
sen.cmt: 非常に冗長な文になっているので、分割しました。 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Takayoshi was born after that and the Kano Disturbance erupted soon after.

sen.j: 満義・満貞父子は足利直義派として各地を転戦、直義の死後はその養子足利直冬や南朝_(日本)と結んで尊氏に敵対した。
sen.e: Mitsuyoshi and Mitsusada; father and son moved from place to place fighting on the side of Tadayoshi ASHIKAGA and after Tadayoshi's death, they allied with his adopted son Tadafuyu and Nancho (Southern Court) and fought against Takauji.
sen.cmt: 文法ミス：fight → fighting に訂正しました。 「敵対した」の部分は、その前の並列に合わせてfought against に訂正しました。
sen.e: Mitsuyoshi and Mitsusada; father and son moved from place to place fighting on the side of Tadayoshi ASHIKAGA and after Tadayoshi's death, they allied with his adopted son Tadafuyu and Nancho (Southern Court) and fought against Takauji.

sen.j: しかし、天下の趨勢を敏感に感じ取った東条の被官層は、延文元年/正平11年（1356年）に満義が没すると、9歳の尊義を奉じて尊氏派に転じ、新たに東条吉良氏として独立する。
sen.e: However Hikan (low-level bureaucrat) of Tojo clan who sensed and went with the current, switched to Takauji clan with nine-year old Takayoshi as their lord when Mistuyoshi died in 1356 and went onto independent as Tojokira clan.

However, sensing the current, Hikan (low-level bureaucrat) of Tojo clan switched to Takauji clan with nine-year old Takayoshi as their lord when Mitsuyoshi died in 1356, and they became independent as Tojokira clan.
sen.cmt: However の後にコンマを入れました。 "Hikan (low-level bureaucrat) of Tojo clan who sensed and went with the current" の部分をすっきりさせるため、訂正しました。went onto independent → became independent に訂正しました。 スペルミス： Mistuyoshi → Mitsuyoshi に訂正しました。
sen.e: However, sensing the current, Hikan (low-level bureaucrat) of Tojo clan switched to Takauji clan with nine-year old Takayoshi as their lord when Mitsuyoshi died in 1356, and they became independent as Tojokira clan.

sen.j: これを押領とする満貞との間で合戦に及ぶが、その後、満貞の北朝_(日本)帰順もあり、和談が成立、尊義は正式に東条相続を認められる。
sen.e: There was a battle with Mitsusada who tried to seize the territory however he returned to his allegiance later to Hokucho (the Northern Dynasty (Japan)), Takayoshi was formally approved to succeed to Tojo clan when the settlement was reached.

There was a battle between Takayoshi and Mitsusada who thought Takayoshi invaded the territory, however, Mitsusada returned to his allegiance later to Hokucho (the Northern Court), and Takayoshi was formally approved to succeed to Tojo clan when the settlement was reached.
sen.cmt: 誤訳： "満貞が「押領」しようとした"というのは誤訳ですので、訂正しました。 Dynasty → Court に訂正しました。
sen.e: There was a battle between Takayoshi and Mitsusada who thought Takayoshi invaded the territory, however, Mitsusada returned to his allegiance later to Hokucho (the Northern Court), and Takayoshi was formally approved to succeed to Tojo clan when the settlement was reached.

sen.j: だが、尊義独立の際の争いはしこりを残し、室町時代を通じて西条・東条両吉良氏は事あるごとに対立・抗争を繰り返すこととなった。
sen.e: However the conflict aroused when Takayoshi became on his own left some ill-feelings and Saijo and Tojo Kira clans constantly faced confrontation and struggle during the Muromachi period.
However, since some ill-feelings were left even after the battle, Saijo Kira and Tojo Kira clans constantly faced confrontation and struggle during the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: However以降の文の構成が正しくありません。「尊義独立の際の」の部分は、前文から受けついでいるので省略して、単にthe battle としました。
sen.e: However, since some ill-feelings were left even after the battle, Saijo Kira and Tojo Kira clans constantly faced confrontation and struggle during the Muromachi period.

sen.j: 応安元年/正平23年（1368年）、東福寺において父満義の十三回忌法要を盛大に営んでいる。
sen.e: He gave a grand 13th Buddhist memorial service to his father Mitsuyoshi at Tofuku-ji Temple in 1368.
Takayoshi gave a grand 13th Buddhist memorial service to his father Mitsuyoshi at Tofuku-ji Temple in 1368.
sen.cmt: 念のためhe をTakayoshi にして、主語を明確にしました。
sen.e: Takayoshi gave a grand 13th Buddhist memorial service to his father Mitsuyoshi at Tofuku-ji Temple in 1368.
His age at death was unknown.

sen.j: 墳墓は吉良庄岡山の霊源寺（現・愛知県幡豆郡吉良町岡山花岳寺境内東条吉良氏墓所）。
sen.e: His tom is located at Reigen-ji Temple in Kirasho Okayama (present Kita-cho, Hazu District, Achichi Prefecture, the burial ground of Tojojikira clan within a compound of Okayama Kagaku-ji Temple).
